ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that the project stage cannot be changed to "In Progress" unless both the Project POC Email Address and Project POC First Name fields are completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "In Progress"), ISBLANK(Project_POC_Email_Address__c) || ISBLANK(Project_Point_of_Contact_txt__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Engagement_Type__c, "Initial Implementation"), ISPICKVAL(Engagement_Type__c, "Upsell/Cross-sell"), ISPICKVAL(Engagement_Type__c, "Services Opportunity") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "The project stage cannot be set to 'In Progress' until both the Project POC Email Address and Project POC First Name fields are completed.
